# SPT Bandpowers from Keisler et al 2011.
# These bandpowers are provided for plotting purposes only.
# The bandpower errors do not include uncertainty in the 
# SPT beam and calibration. 
# Version 1.0, Created 16May2011.
#
# ell_center, D_ell (uK2), sigma(D_ell) (uK2)
#

725 2010 98
